name: Ham Rush
description:
Hamlet is on his way home, but many dangers await… Help him find his way through the field, and stock up on delicious fruits and grains to face obstacles and predators.

Controls: mouse

Tutorial:

Created by:
Dalton5000 - Original idea, Programming and Animation
Phildjii - Idea development, Game Design and Art

A game created for Godot Wild Jam #12. The theme was "Pick at least 2 out of the 3 words: Chain | Destruction | Harvest"

Tools

Made with Godot 3.1.1 - https://godotengine.org/

Designed in Figma

Font: Cardenio Modern

Music: https://incompetech.com/
